DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether early use transjugular intrahepatic portosystemic shunt ( TIPS ) Polytetrafluoroethylene ( PTFE ) cover stent able prolong survival cirrhotic patient high risk acute variceal bleeding .
DOC.brief_title: Early TIPS With Polytetrafluoroethylene ( PTFE ) Covered Stents High Risk Acute Variceal Bleeding Cirrhotic Patients
DOC.criteria: History cirrhosis ( clinical liver biopsy ) Admission due acute bleed oesophageal gastric ( GOV1 GOV2 ) varices ChildPugh Class C ( ChildPugh score less equal 13 ) ChildPugh class B Signed write informed consent Patients fulfil inclusion criterion Pregnancy breastfeed Confirmed hepatocellular carcinoma follow characteristic : one nodule 5 cm ; 3 great 3 cm Creatinine great 3 mg/dl Terminal hepatic failure ( ChildPugh score great 13 ) Previous treatment TIPS combine pharmacological endoscopic treatment prevent rebleeding Fundal ectopic gastric variceal bleeding ( IGV1 IGV2 ) Portal vein thrombosis cavernoma Congestive heart failure New York Heart Association ( NYHA ) great III medical history pulmonary hypertension Spontaneous recurrent hepatic encephalopathy
